nodes.text: The Nyriaan Concord was the planetary government of the world Nyriaan.

The Nyriaan Concord was created by the Galactic Republic in 30 BBY under the terms of the Luire Accord, in an attempt to resolve tensions between the native Nyriaanans and the various mining corporations that operated on the planet. The Concord was based in Locus, the capital of Nyriaan, and the Jedi Amar Cros became the leader of the Concord's native delegation. However, Cros found the political body to be corrupt and ill-prepared, and he left in disgust.
